a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTRotavirusLogic (IMMZ.D2.DT.Rotavirus) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a rotavirus vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: IMMZ.D2.DT.Rotavirus * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTRotavirusLogic

def.name: Client is not due for rotavirus vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for rotavirus vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with first rotavirus dose as client's age is less than 6 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with first rotavirus dose as live vaccine was administered in last 4 weeks. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with second rotavirus dose as live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with third rotavirus dose as live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks and series administered to client is a mixed or unknown series. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with third rotavirus dose as live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.

def.name: Client is due for rotavirus vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for rotavirus vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should vaccinate client with first rotavirus dose as no rotavirus doses were administered, client's age is within appropriate age range and no live vaccine was administered in last 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should vaccinate client with second rotavirus dose as client's age is within appropriate age range and no live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should vaccinate client with third rotavirus dose as no live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks and series administered to client is a mixed or unknown series. Check for contraindications.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should vaccinate client with third rotavirus dose as series contains more than two doses and no live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.
